mapper.sql: fund_id, fund_name, city, town, collect_finish_date, invest_date
mapper.select: select a.* from pm_fund_info a inner join pm_id_org_fund b on a.fund_id=b.fund_id where b.org_id = #{orgId}
select * from pm_fund_info where fund_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') limit #{from},10
mapper.insert: insert into pm_fund_info (fund_id, fund_name, city, town, collect_finish_date, invest_date, fund_desc) values (#{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectFinishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into pm_fund_info
fund_id,
fund_name,
city,
town,
collect_finish_date,
invest_date,
fund_desc,

#{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update pm_fund_info
fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
collect_finish_date = #{collectFinishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invest_date = #{investDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund_desc = #{fundDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pm_fund_info set fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collect_finish_date = #{collectFinishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invest_date = #{investDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fund_desc = #{fundDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pm_fund_info set fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collect_finish_date = #{collectFinishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invest_date = #{investDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
